ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 5; Who Was That Masked Man
ComicInfo.Summary: The Lone Ranger Meets the Green Hornet in “Champions of Justice” #5 of 5! In this last issue concluding the saga of the Reid family, the torch finally passes from The Lone Ranger to The Green Hornet… but is the price that must be paid in blood worth it? We cannot provide any more details of this story without using spoilers, but we truly believe our readers will find the denouement uplifting while at the same time being emotionally affected by the intense ending of a tale that has been 80 years in the making!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 19:42:43. [CVDB557387]
ComicInfo.Characters: Kato, Lenore Case, Lone Ranger, Michael Axford, The Green Hornet
